summary.span: 表示在容器 (Container) 控制項中顯示包含文字之控制項的方向。

span.span: Represents the direction in which to display controls that include text in a container control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉，代表要在其中顯示包含的文字容器控制項中的控制項的方向。The enumeration represents the direction in which to display controls that include text in a container control. 控制項，例如和控制項，其屬性可使用以指定要在其中顯示子控制項的方向的列舉值包含的文字。Controls, such as the and controls, have properties that use the enumeration values to specify the direction in which to display child controls that include text. 如果您指定 LeftToRight 值，包含文字的子控制項就會顯示從左到右和對齊左邊的容器控制項上文字的文字。If you specify the LeftToRight value, child controls that include text display text from left to right and justify the text on the left side of the container control. 如果您指定從右至左值，包含文字的子控制項就會顯示由右至左的文字，並讓容器控制項右側文字對齊。If you specify the RightToLeft value, child controls that include text display text from right to left and justify the text on the right side of the container control. 若要顯示其文字由右至左，如阿拉伯文與希伯來文書寫的語言使用從右至左值。Use the RightToLeft value to display text for languages that are written from right to left, such as Arabic and Hebrew. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用列舉來設定屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the enumeration to set the property. A控制項填入列舉值。A control is populated with the enumeration values. 標籤和選項按鈕，在使用者從清單方塊中選取的值為基礎的面板變更顯示方向。The display direction of the label and radio buttons in the panel change based on the value that the user selects from the list box. 由於這個範例會使用英文，選取從右至左值時，對齊文字的右邊維護控制，但左到右的順序英文文字。Because this example uses English text, when the RightToLeft value is selected, the text is justified on the right side of the control, but the left-to-right order of the English text is maintained. 在真實世界應用程式中，您就不應設定屬性設為從右至左值，如果您已顯示文字的語言使用左到右的順序。In a real-world application, you would not set the property to the RightToLeft value, if you were displaying text for a language that uses left-to-right order.
